name: The Ecdysis
description:
THE ECDYSIS is an episodic Action/ Adventure game that immerses players in the life of Robin Jr., a professional photographer, guiding them through the thrilling adventures and enigmatic mysteries he experiences on his journey.

Play as Robin jr, a professional photographer who embarks on a journey to his dream place to experience and capture the nature and wildlife
but you know... not everything works as planned. As a number of mysterious events occur, robin has to investigate and find out what's happening around him.

GRIPPING STORYLINE

-Engage in an exciting contemporary narrative and endeavor to piece together the clues to the fullest extent possible.

CINEMATIC PLAYTHROUGH

-Embark on a cinematic adventure as you delve into the game, immersing yourself in its stunning visuals and captivating storyline.

GO FOR A LONG DRIVE

-Get your truck ready and gear up for an epic expedition to conquer the heights of the mysterious Mt. Mare's Nest.

FIGHT FOR YOUR LIFE

-Prepare to confront and overcome those who oppose your progress.

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

-Enjoy a distinct original soundtrack and background score created by Kingsley Roy, an independent musician.
